alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 1:50PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Worcester and northwestern Middlesex Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 150 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fitchburg, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Lowell, Leominster, Fitchburg, Chelmsford, Dracut, Tewksbury, Westford, Gardner, Pepperell, Tyngsborough, Groton, Lunenburg, Townsend, Westminster, Shirley, Ashburnham, Dunstable and Ashby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central and northeastern Massachusetts.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County
